message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $9,500?
